segments.text: I'm going to Beijing tomorrow . I'm packing my luggage .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What will you bring along when traveling ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will take some clothes to change and cleaning items .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you packed the camera yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I've already put it in my suitcase .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Pack some necessary medicine in your carry-on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I almost forget it . Thank you !
segments.speaker: S2
